scripts.env:guide: npx playwright --version && npx playwright install && cross-envtest_env=international npx playwright test tests/bushwiseRecruitment.spec.ts && npx allure generate test-results
scripts.env:sa: npx playwright --version && npx playwright install && cross-env test_env=southafrica npx playwright test tests/bushwiseRecruitment.spec.ts && npx allure generate test-results
